#summary How to install Feed on Feeds straight from svn
#labels Featured

==Get code==

{{{
$ cd /WEB/ROOT
$ svn checkout http://feed-on-feeds.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ feed-on-feeds
}}}

==Modify fof-config.php==

{{{
$ cd feed-on-feeds
$ nano fof-config.php # or your favorite $EDITOR
}}}

Change these settings to match how MySQL is configured on your web server:

{{{
// Database connection information.  Host, username, password, database name.

define('FOF_DB_HOST', "host.example.com");
define('FOF_DB_USER', "username");
define('FOF_DB_PASS', "password");
define('FOF_DB_DBNAME', "database");
}}}

==Run install.php==

Navigate to http://your-server.com/feed-on-feeds/install.php in your browser

Database tables will be created, and a local 'cache' directory will be created.  You will be prompted to create a password for the 'admin' user.

==Done!==

Navigate to http://your-server.com/feed-on-feeds/, login, and start subscribing or creating users!
